name: PlayStation 5
description: The PlayStation 5 is the latest gaming console from Sony, featuring powerful hardware and an immersive gaming experience.

name: Xbox Series X
description: The Xbox Series X is Microsoft's next-generation gaming console, offering high performance and a wide range of games.

name: Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch is a versatile gaming console that can be used both as a handheld device and connected to a TV for console gaming.

name: PlayStation 4 Pro
description: The PlayStation 4 Pro is an upgraded version of the PlayStation 4, offering enhanced graphics and performance for gaming enthusiasts.

name: Xbox One X
description: The Xbox One X is a powerful gaming console with 4K gaming capabilities and a large library of games.

name: Nintendo Switch Lite
description: The Nintendo Switch Lite is a compact and lightweight version of the Nintendo Switch, designed for handheld gaming.

name: PlayStation 4 Slim
description: The PlayStation 4 Slim is a sleek and compact version of the PlayStation 4, perfect for casual gamers.

name: Xbox One S
description: The Xbox One S is a slim and stylish gaming console with 4K video streaming capabilities and a vast library of games.
